knimeNode.name: GZip Compress Binary Object
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node compresses a binary object column using the gzip compression algorithm

intro.p: This node compresses a binary object column using the gzip compression algorithm. The node also reports the compression ratio (length in bytes of uncompressed blob / length in bytes of compressed blob))
This node was developed by Vernalis Research (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com

fullDescription.option: Select the incoming binary object column
Should the input column be replaced? If not, the new column will have the suffix ' (GZip'd)' appended

ports.outPort: The input table with the compressed binary objects
